mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as user_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.created_at, ups.site_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferred_sites ups ON u.id = ups.user_id WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT u.id as user_id, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.created_at, ups.site_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferred_sites ups ON u.id = ups.user_id WHERE u.id = #{id}
